tweet: Facing mounting criticism for this Soviet-style process, House Democrats produced H.Res. 660 under the guise of transparency. The American people won’t be fooled by their tricks. We must stand for true accountability & fairness. Anything less than a transparent process is a sham.

It’s ironic that House Democrats are putting their too-little, too-late impeachment inquiry resolution on the Floor for a vote on ... #Halloween. 

From day one, this sham impeachment process has been one trick after another. The American people expect - and deserve - better.

#NationalCybersecurityAwarenessMonth is coming to a close, and all Americans should take a moment to review their cyber safety. Too many people in PA and across the country are preyed upon by bad actors. By working together, all of us can do our part to promote cybersecurity. pic.twitter.com/iBdildwAvr

Cancer doesn't discriminate on party lines. Grateful to join a bipartisan group of Members of Congress to highlight the importance of #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth as we reaffirm our commitment to patients and survivors. pic.twitter.com/UhMSWUtbBj

After months of Soviet-style secrecy, House Democrats - at long last - are coming to terms with their sham impeachment strategy.  

The American people won't be fooled by their tricks. We must stand for fairness over continuing this partisan inquisition.

The death of Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi is yet another blow to ISIS and a major victory in our nation’s continued battle against terrorism. 

Today and every day, we are indebted to the men and women of the U.S. Armed Forces who defend freedom and pursue justice across the world.

Today we mourn the loss of our fellow Americans in the violent attack on the Tree of Life Synagogue a year ago. As a nation, we must continue our shared fight against hatred and discrimination in all facets of our life together.

Congress cannot put a political agenda ahead of the American people. It’s time to end House Democrats’ partisan investigations and work together to deliver real solutions for the critical issues facing our nation.
